title: Shakugan no Shana Movie (Shakugan no Shana: The Movie)
synopsis: Crimson Denizens and Rinne, beings from a parallel world, seek to devour humans' precious existences. To restore the delicate balance of the world, Flame Hazes hunt these entities down.
